snippet: The seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund teamed with Service in Schools in mobilizing students from 18 high schools for community service projects.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York teams with Service in Schools to mobilize students from 18 high schools for community service projects.
lead_paragraph: The seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund teamed with Service in Schools in mobilizing students from 18 high schools for community service projects.
